page.title: 13HEDGEROWS PART2
page.content: {Red Campion }has broad leaves and a deep pink flower and blooms from May -November.{White Campion }the same as {Red}but with a white flower.Blooms May to August.{Gorse }Until the 17th. century Woodham Mortimer was Common Land covered with gorse.Later it changed to farmland but a few bushes have reappeared .Flowers March-June.{ {Buttercup }flowers rubbed onto a cows udder were thought to improve the milk Flowers April-June.{Clover }Red and white are found equally in our area. White is found mainly in gardens and recreation grounds.Red in long grass. Red stands above long grass while white clover lies on the ground. Flowers May-September.
